    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [<?xml ]                                1         7
    [version]                               7         14
    [=]                                     14        15
    ["1.0"]                                 15        20
    [encoding]                              21        29
    [=]                                     29        30
    ["UTF-8"]                               30        37
    [?>]                                    37        39
    [\n]                                    39        40
L2
    [<]                                     1         2
    [someTag]                               2         9
    [>]                                     9         10
    [\n\t]                                  10        2
L3
    [<]                                     2         3
    [someOtherTag]                          3         15
    [>]                                     15        16
    [Somehow we would like to improve t[    16        126
    [<]                                     126       127
    [/]                                     127       128
    [someOtherTag]                          128       140
    [>]                                     140       141
    [\n\t]                                  141       2

    [<]                                     2         3
    [someOtherTag]                          3         15
    [>]                                     15        16

    [<]                                     126       127
    [/]                                     127       128
    [someOtherTag]                          128       140
    [>]                                     140       141
    [\n]                                    141       142

    [<]                                     1         2
    [/]                                     2         3
    [someTag]                               3         10
